name: Marie (AlexAlimbuyuguen)
description:
Marie has been given a new stuffed toy on her birthday, just before midnight. She has been eagerly waiting for this present as her parents have been teasing her with this present throughout the entire day. They tell her to name the doll, to which Marie responds by using her own name. It’s almost midnight, so the parents leave Marie’s room to go to bed.  As marie prepares to go to, a horrifying and unsettling sound can be heard and all the lights are off. She notices that her door is open and her new doll’s head has been ripped right off. She calls to her parents out of fear, but no response...

This is a prototype, created for the purpose of a games development course by Alex Alimbuyuguen and Alex Gubieski.
